abstract: Lee Baca, 77, was convicted in 2017 of obstructing an F.B.I. investigation into corruption and civil rights abuses at jails under his control.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge on Wednesday ordered Lee Baca, a former Los Angeles County sheriff convicted of obstructing an F.B.I. investigation into his departmentâ€™s troubled jails, to report to prison within three weeks.
